messages.subject: Kitabatake Chikafusa's Jinno Shotoki (Chronicle of Gods and Sovereigns)
messages.msgSnippet: Anyone have an opinion on this book, the Columbia University translation? I have an interest in Chikafusa, however the book is only available in hardcover, and
messages.messageBody:
Anyone have an opinion on this book, the Columbia University
translation? I have an interest in Chikafusa, however the book is only
available in hardcover, and so is quite pricey... does it contain enough
worthwhile information to justify the price?

Thanks,
Angus
